citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10pm on August
1st, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone, email, knocking on facility doors, and then waited 30
minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
This is the first attempted inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10pm on August 
1st, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone, email, knocking on facility doors, and then waited 30 
minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
This is the first attempted inspection. 
 
 
End Section
